```{r setup, include=FALSE}
seurat_obj <- metacells_by_groups(
  seurat_obj = cho.combined.sct,
  group.by = c("treatment"), # specify the columns in seurat_obj@meta.data to group by
  k = 25, # nearest-neighbors parameter
)

seurat_obj <- NormalizeMetacells(seurat_obj)
```


```{r}
seurat_obj <- SetDatExpr(
  seurat_obj,
  group.by='cell_type', # the metadata column containing the cell type info. This same column should have also been used in MetacellsByGroups
  group_name = "INH", # the name of the group of interest in the group.by column
  use_metacells=TRUE,
  slot = 'data'
)
```

## Including Plots

